attributes.action: Exempt all members of HM Forces from paying Tax when outside UK for a period exceeding six months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present all UK armed forces pay tax when abroad, including on operational tours.  Civil Servants serving alongside HM Forces do not pay tax.  i propose that All members of HM Forces be exempt from paying Tax when deployed on tours exceeding 6 months duration.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/armytax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
